title: Get Unlimited Access to RXN
subtitle: Accelerated Discovery
description:
Integrate RXN for Chemistry into your existing workflows. Get API access, no rate limitations, and the managed infrastructure required for cutting-edge research applications.


Individual Plan

Pay as you go, with discounts for increased use. Currently only available in the US.


Cost based on monthly compute time:

0-480 minutes     USD 0.70/minute
480-960 min     USD 0.50/minute
960+ min     USD 0.40/minute

Sign up for access to RXN then go to your Account settings to enter your credit card information.


Team Plan

Flat-fee team licenses. Choose annual billing and save 10%.


Billed annually     USD 88000/yr (up to 10 users)
Billed monthly     USD 8150/month (up to 10 users)

Contact a representative for a Team Plan or for more information on RXN for Chemistry.
